name: Into The Light DEMO
description:
Into The Light (Demo) is an preview of a Walking Simulator project that is currently nearing the end of development, with a few bugs / graphical issues present in this version (See Development Log). 

Into The Light takes place in an abandoned Victorian Village, where unknown forces have destroyed most of the village, leaving it inhabitable. You, the player, awake in the village without your sight and it's up to you to recover your sight to gain the full picture of the village around you. Assisting you on the journey is a series of pulses that highlight elements of the world and allow you to navigate through the village whilst your sight is depleted. 

Into The Light was developed using a small group of Games Design and 3D Animation and Games students from Middlesex University London
